duties_responsibilities.duty: Support and maintain Windows desktops, server systems, and Linux devices in a lab environment.
Design and implement hardware and software installation projects.
Troubleshoot and debug compute device systems.
Customize systems for specific functional areas or unique user needs.
Provide user training and education, including re-imaging and new hardware setup.
Install and troubleshoot printers, diagnose and resolve hardware and software issues for users.
Ensure client satisfaction, manage client relationships, and report status and resource needs.
Mentor and train junior Regional IT Specialists, provide leadership and project management.

education_certification.credential: CompTIA's A+ and Network+ certification preferred; MCSE: Desktop Infrastructure and CCNA a plus
